name: Domestic and foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, by type of R&D and selected industry for companies that performed foreign R&D: 2016
description: Domestic and foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, by type of R&D and selected industry for companies that performed foreign R&D: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_research_basic_and_applied_paid_for_bycompany
variableMeasured.description: Research Basic And Applied Paid For Bycompany

variableMeasured.name: field_research_basic_and_applied_paid_for_byothers
variableMeasured.description: Research Basic And Applied Paid For Byothers

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed foreign R&D.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey, 2016.
